dcterms:description: The Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC) dataset consists of a training set of 350 news articles, containing over 16,965 total sentences, with manually spotted and labeled propagandistic fragments. It includes a development set of 61 articles with 2,235 total sentences and a test set of 86 articles with 3,526 total sentences.
dcterms:title: Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC)
